Yet another imagines blog appears in dedication to the wonderful characters of BNHA.

Inbox: Open!

Pending requests: 8

summary: How would our bois Iida and Todoroki help their s/o who needs to rehearse for a play? Would they read lines or just listen to...
question: How would our bois Iida and Todoroki help their s/o who needs to rehearse for a play? Would they read lines or just listen to mono movies and give ideas? Stuff like that. Sorry if it's weird
answer:
Worry not nonnie, this is a completely normal request and not weird at all ^^

Iida Tenya

  • Does his due diligence to research everything related to plays and how to effectively prepare for one because he wants to see you succeed. He temporarily becomes your impromptu acting coach and partner—running lines with you over and over again, attempting to perform some of the scenes so you could gain the necessary practice and experience. 
  • His dark circles are prominent the next day, but he quickly brushes off your worries and shares the valuable insights and useful methods he learned through listening to acting podcasts and watching live performances on the media. Though he tells you to take the bits of advice with a grain of salt and use the ones that will help strengthen your craft. 
  • His knack for pep-talks comes in handy minutes before the show as your swirling anxiety is through the roof and your mind’s aflutter from the tingling nerves coursing through your veins. But sweet and charismatic Iida knows exactly what to say and restores your confidence, adding that if you’re still feeling scared while on stage to search for him amidst the crowd and pretend that it’s just you and him rehearsing for your play.

Todoroki Shouto 

  • Todoroki’s delighted to be of assistance because he’s the happiest whenever he can be useful to you and helping you rehearse for your upcoming performance is well within his capabilities. Rehearsal practice with him typically happens during the late evenings or early mornings since hero education and disciplinary training calls for a demanding schedule. However, any additional free time he has is always dedicated to you. 
  • After reading over the script and running lines with you a number of times, he suggests acting them out instead of just sitting and remaining stagnant since it doesn’t show much progress after a while. Todoroki apologies in advance for his poor acting abilities while performing the scene with you, but he’ll do anything to help develop your performance even if he’s making a complete fool of himself. 
  • While Todoroki doesn’t possess much knowledge about acting and what is discerned as good or bad, he does his utmost best to provide constructive criticisms to help you improve and make the necessary corrections to avoid making the same mistakes twice. Though Todoroki gives you (and actors/actresses alike) his many respects because he doesn’t realize how difficult acting can be.

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Lover's Pond
description:
by Stylish_Racoon

“Are we fated lovers? I always wondered that. Finding this pond makes me feel…” He lowered his gaze and chuckled airily. “Makes me feel like we are. It’s kinda stupid.”

“It is,” Katsuki agreed.

Eijirou glanced at him for only one second, then his averted his gaze, blushed and snorted another laugh. “Blame my romantic heart for that.”

“You don’t need a pond to tell you we are.”

Words: 2618, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of Breath Of The Wild AU

  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou
  • Additional Tags: Fluff, botw au, Fandom Fusion, Crossover

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: 5 seconds
description:
by eithne (vsay)

“uh, baks, i only said 5 se-”

“fuck off.” came the sharp reply, and everyone was pretty certain that they were looking at a very much dead kirishima.
he was making little sounds of embarrassment, and seemed to be having a hard time functioning like a normal human being. he kept making desperate attempts to speak japanese, but was failing miserably, instead just getting out basic syllables of romanji and crying out in angst when that didn’t work either.

“quit whining.” he heard, and he was very quick to shut up, and instead looked somewhere across the room, almost looking like he was about to cry. his shoulder hurt like a bitch, but honestly, with this happening, he couldn’t feel jack shit. not anything. he just felt like he was going to die, and honestly, he was pretty sure if you asked him to go to the grave right now, he’d just hobble on over and accept death like the man he was.

except for, he wasn’t a man like this, and would never consider himself to be a man in this situation.

Words: 3417, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Ashido Mina, Tokoyami Fumikage, Aoyama Yuuga
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou
  • Additional Tags: Bakugou Katsuki Swears A Lot, Kirishima Eijirou is a Ray of Sunshine, Fluff, Bakugou Katsuki is Bad at Feelings, katsuki loves him a lot, bakugou katsuki loves cuddles, kirishima loves them too, set after kirishima got hurt in an rp, kats is mad because he’s hurt, but looks after him anyway, there’s no kissing but they love each other, I promise
